comments: "Adrien-Marie Legendre in 1778 published his work 'Essai sur la th√©orie des nombres' where he proposed a modified form of the first approximation, pi(n) ~ n/ln n." (Gullberg)
references: Jan Gullberg, "Mathematics, From the Birth of Numbers," W. W. Norton and Company, NY and London, 1997, page 80.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 1000); t=log(10); for (n=0, 500, write("b058289.txt", n, " ", round(10^n/(n*t - 1.08366))); ); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 22 2009
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 07 2000
extensions: Corrected some terms. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 22 2009
